item.name: Kamberra
item.address1: Cnr Northbourne Avenue/Flemington Road, Lyneham, ACT 2602
item.description: Kamberra was part of the Hardys group, established in 2000 with the planting of 40 ha of vines and a winery in the ACT, only a few hundred metres from the showground facilities where the National Wine Show is held every year. Riesling and Shiraz are fully estate-grown, and most of the wines have a Kamberra component.
